channel.title: 317 [PI] (Need help with Doors)
channel.description:
Hello there, I have a Insidiax v1 I'm working on, and I wanted to get some help with [Doors] So, I have multiple doors and I need to open them, so it can be opened and closed, when you Right-click on the door to [Open/Close] and as of right now they don't work. I've never really worked on Doors, so I don't really know How/What to do.
If anyone can help me that'd be great.
Any help is greatly appreciated.

item.title: 317 [PI] (Need help with Doors)
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

uncalled for:

http://lmgtfy.com/?q=rsps+pi+how+to+make+working+doors

why don’t you check it yourself…
I don’t want to remove my doors, I don’t want to make a teleport when you click on a stair to teleport upstairs…
I want to actually make them open/close.
I did search but nothing useful came to me, that’s why I made a thread here.

Read full topic
